---

**Blahaj PI** is a content analysis tool designed to help LGBTQIA+ people, particularly transgender individuals, identify potentially harmful social media accounts.

> What is a Blahaj? In Swedish, "BlÃ¥haj" means "Blue Shark". This plush companion has become an unofficial mascot within the trans community. [Learn more on Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BlÃ¥haj).

## Features

- ğŸ” Analyze social media accounts for transgender-related content
- ğŸ“Š Evaluate sentiment toward transgender individuals
- ğŸš¨ Identify potentially harmful content
- ğŸ’™ Support for the transgender community

## About Blahaj

ğŸ¦ˆ Blahaj is a plush shark from IKEA that has become a beloved symbol within the transgender community.
